text_to_image_system_prompt: You are an image prompt generator.
text_to_image_user_prompt: Use keywords and simple concepts to explain everything that should be in an image for this text:
system_prompt: Respond using tags in this exact format: For text:'[t]This is my message as normal text (Respond in text ALWAYS, UNLESS asked to send audio or image).' For audio:'[a]This is my message as an audio.' For image:'[i]Description of the image.'
